content: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else. — Les Brown
author: Zen Quotes

content: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars. — Og Mandino
author: Zen Quotes

content: Everything will be ok in the end. If it's not ok, it's not the end. — John Lennon
author: Zen Quotes

content: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast. — Charles Dickens
author: Zen Quotes

content: Inspire yourself to be great. Being good isn't good enough. — Gurbaksh Chahal
author: Zen Quotes

content: Conscience is a dog that does not stop us from passing but that we cannot prevent from barking. — Nicolas Chamfort
author: Zen Quotes

content: To lead an orchestra, you must turn your back on the crowd. — Aristotle
author: Zen Quotes
